Geospatial Data
fields.short_descr: Geospatial data is any data associated with or containing information about specific locations on the Earth's surface, including three-dimensional information. In simple terms, geospatial data is any data related to an object which has its position on the earth
fields.descr: Geospatial data is any data associated with or containing information about specific locations on the Earth's surface, including  three-dimensional information. In simple terms, geospatial data is any data related to an object which has its position on the earth - a mountain, horse, lake, river, road, building and countless others. There is a set of programs that enable the collection and analysis of spatial data and geographic data. Geospatial analysis includes the collection, display, processing, and analysis of imagery, as well as the use of GPS, satellite imagery, and historical data.Geospatial data is very important to the benefits of people all over the Earth.

fields.name: Commerce Data
fields.short_descr: Retail data is a set of data about your retail customers or a specific industry. This data serves to improve your business and allows you to make better decisions, to make better profits.
fields.descr:
Retail data is a set of data about your retail customers or a specific industry. This data serves to improve your business and allows you to make better decisions, to make better profits.
One type of retail data includes point-of-sale information, loyalty card data, and market data. While the other includes supply chain and merchandising data.
Attendance data is also used to determine which departments of your business are popular. This gives you insight into how to better attract customers. Accordingly, the customers of that store are more satisfied and the store itself is more competitive.
In simple words, if businessman uses this data correctly, it increases business efficiency, saves money and increases sales.

fields.name: Financial Market Data
fields.short_descr: Financial market data, or simply market data, is information that is usually published by a trading platform such as a stock exchange. This is designed to keep traders informed of the latest prices of financial instruments such as stocks, derivatives, commodities and currencies.
fields.descr:
Financial market data, or simply market data, is information that is usually published by a trading platform such as a stock exchange.
The financial marketplace has a system of economic relationships involving the borrowing, issuance, buying, and selling of securities, precious metals, currencies, and other investment instruments.
This is designed to keep traders informed of the latest prices of financial instruments such as stocks, derivatives, commodities and currencies.
Subsequently, investors and traders use this data to decide whether to sell or buy stocks in the market. But in addition to information about the financial market at the moment, historical information is just as important and is used to analyze and calculate risk.

fields.name: Consumer Data
fields.short_descr: Consumer data is all the information about consumers that marketing companies and their departments collect from their customer base. It includes details of their household, demographics and lifestyle to their behavior and buying habits.
fields.descr:
Consumer data is all the information about consumers that marketing companies and their departments collect from their customer base. It includes details of their household, demographics and lifestyle to their behavior and buying habits.
The first thing to do is to gain insight into customers' online buying behavior, which is to collect data. The collected data is then processed in customer analytics. This creates an understanding of customer behavior and a portrait of the customer. Which allows you to sell specific products to specific people or demographic groups.
Also, collecting customer data allows you to see customer satisfaction and serves to increase overall customer satisfaction.

fields.name: B2B Data
fields.short_descr: B2B - basically refers to a business database, and defines who do you sell your product to. In simple terms, if your company sells a product to another business, it is a B2B company.
fields.descr:
B2B - basically refers to a business database, and defines who do you sell your product to. In simple terms, if your company sells a product to another business, it is a B2B company. Sales, marketing, business development, recruiters and even founders use B2B data to contact other businesses and offer them their services/products. 
Sales data is any data associated with a company. It can be branded graphics and graphic information or any other type of information. Let's say a person needs to contact the purchasing managers of a company that provides a particular product. This is where B2B database providers come to your rescue.
In addition to everything B2B data also helps to attract and retain customers, allows you to find new customers and contact them.

fields.name: Identity Data
fields.short_descr: Digital marketing is increasingly connected to each individual user. This is the case because a better-informed consumer wants to see in their field the kind of advertising that will resonate with their needs and tastes.
fields.descr:
Digital marketing is increasingly connected to each individual user. This is the case because a better-informed consumer wants to see in their field the kind of advertising that will resonate with their needs and tastes. In essence, identity data is this personalized information. Personal information, contact information for online consumers is what identifying information is all about. All of this allows us to accurately identify users, their perceived interests and needs, which marketers can use to develop targeted advertising campaigns.
So collecting customer identify data allows you to see customer satisfaction and serves to increase overall customer satisfaction.

fields.name: Transport and Logistics Data
fields.short_descr: Transportation and logistics data is information related to the transportation of goods and the logistics, handling, and storage of goods assisting their customers in the process of moving goods from producer to consumer.
fields.descr:
Transportation and logistics data is information related to the transportation of goods and the logistics, handling, and storage of goods assisting their customers in the process of moving goods from producer to consumer. This information contributes to better shipments and the most efficient logistics management.
Logistics data enables: expanding markets, reducing shipping costs and as a result reducing costs, facilitating export/import and customs clearance and much more.
For this reason that transportation and logistics data sets are among the most important; because this information is used by businesses to make sure they are operating at maximum efficiency.

fields.name: Environmental Data
fields.short_descr: Environmental data are data based on measurements of environmental pressures, environmental conditions, and ecosystem impacts. They are usually the "P", "S", and "I" models of DPSIR, where D = drivers, P = pressure, S = state, I = impact, R = response.
fields.descr:
Environmental data are data based on measurements of environmental pressures, environmental conditions, and ecosystem impacts. They are usually the "P", "S", and "I" models of DPSIR, where D = drivers, P = pressure, S = state, I = impact, R = response. This data is usually collected by environmental law or environmental research agencies. Environmental statistics are usually collected by statistical offices, so it is also considered environmental data.
The collection and analysis of environmental data is now error-free and accurate thanks to a new method of data collection. It is also possible to obtain environmental data remotely without the need for data entry thanks to satellite and sensor technology.

fields.name: Credit Rating Data
fields.short_descr: Credit rating data is a set of information about the credit history of an individual or a legal entity. Thus, before approving a loan, the financial capacity of the person or entity requesting the loan must be taken into consideration.
fields.descr:
Credit rating data is a set of information about the credit history of an individual or a legal entity. Thus, before approving a loan, the financial capacity of the person or entity requesting the loan must be taken into consideration. Without this, it is impossible to determine whether the debtor has the right and ability to obtain a credit facility, and whether they will be able to repay the debt at a certain time. This analysis is done based on their financial performance. 
Credit rating data provides information about the financial capabilities of individuals or companies seeking credit. Based on the credit history, a credit rating is calculated and a decision is made as to whether the credit line is feasible.

fields.name: Real Estate Data
fields.short_descr: Real estate data is a collection of information about properties, their purpose, value, and ownership. Investors use this data to make an informed decision about investing in the most profitable deal, based on real-time property values.
fields.descr:
Real estate data is a collection of information about properties, their purpose, value, and ownership. Investors use this data to make an informed decision about investing in the most profitable deal, based on real-time property values.
This data is easy to use not only for investors, but also for anyone else who is involved in buying/selling/renting real estate in one way or another. In fact, real estate data can be divided into the following four categories: residential real estate data, commercial real estate data, industrial real estate data and land data.
In any case, whatever type of real estate investors or anyone is interested in, there is data for them.

fields.name: Web Data
fields.short_descr: Web data is information about the browsing history, behavior, and preferences of various users on the Internet collected from various websites and applications.
fields.descr:
Web data is information about the browsing history, behavior, and preferences of various users on the Internet collected from various websites and applications.
User data is collected from both first-party and third-party sources, which web providers later combine to create an accurate online consumer profile.
The proprietary data information shows how much time a user spent on a website, which pages they clicked on in the same domain. Whereas sources collecting information about third-party data show information about a user's online habits and create an accurate consumer profile.
These two types of data together make it possible to compile a set of web data.

fields.name: Mobile App Data
fields.short_descr: Mobile app data or in other words, the data that is collected from the mobile app. It is termed as first-party data. This data is derived from mobile applications to analyze and identify unique users
fields.descr:
Mobile app data or in other words, the data that is collected from the mobile app. It is termed as first-party data. This data is derived from mobile applications to analyze and identify unique users, record their behavior online and real-time, and then leverage this data into the existing workflow, CRM, dashboards, communication platforms and many more.
The first party data could be user-centric information wherein each data point can be user profiles, upgrades, installs, processes, location tracking data and even push notifications.
Mobile App Data is similar to Environmental Data, B2B Data, Energy Data, Real Estate Data, and Geospatial Data. These data categories are commonly used for Mobile Advertising and App Intelligence.

fields.name: Legal Data
fields.short_descr: Legal data is data about the law, it includes court records, cases, court documents, judges, attorney information, contact information, law firms, litigation history and parties involved.
fields.descr:
Legal data includes court records, cases, court documents, judges, attorney information, contact information, law firms, litigation history and parties involved. In simple terms, it is data about the law.
This information is gathered from various court and law firm reports, news articles, government websites and federal records centers. This information is exclusively verified.
Data providers carefully analyze and organize the data they receive. It is also their responsibility to update the information frequently to ensure that it is current and timely.
Choosing the right legal data provider is a very important business and it really depends on the data requirements, including budget and geographic coverage

fields.name: Healthcare Data
fields.short_descr: Healthcare data is data about a patient's health; in other words, it is all the information that is collected when a patient is being cared for. The information collected is subsequently processed, stored and disseminated.
fields.descr:
Healthcare data is data about a patient's health; in other words, it is all the information that is collected when a patient is being cared for. The information collected is subsequently processed, stored and disseminated. This data reveals key points such as: medical costs, patient behavior and necessary pharmaceuticals. This makes it possible to understand the level of public health, reduce costs, improve treatment methods and subsequently raise the general level of health.
In this way, medical data solve both local organizational problems like reducing workload and global problems like predicting epidemics and better controlling existing diseases.
